thread.title: Ben Bernanke blames wife for title of memoir 'Courage to Act'
thread.title_full: Ben Bernanke blames wife for title of memoir 'Courage to Act'

author: From marketwatch.com
title: Ben Bernanke blames wife for title of memoir 'Courage to Act'
text: From marketwatch.com In financial circles, Ben Bernanke has been referred to as helicopter Ben, for his easy-money policies. But on Wednesday. the ex-Federal Reserve boss traded in his helicopter for a busat least that is what it might seem like to his wife. Bernanke blamed his wife, Anna, for the bold title of his latest memoir The Courage to Act, during an interview on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert. Pointing to his spouse as the person behind title left some feeling as if hed effectively thrown his better half under the bus. I totally blame my wife, it was entirely her idea, Bernanke replied. She does like me and she thought I did a good ... (
